definition: to try harder/to redouble one's efforts
to use one's best efforts to do sth (idiom)
if you are lazy in your prime, you'll be sorry in your old age
pinyin: shao4 zhuang4 bu4 nu3 li4 , lao3 da4 tu2 shang1 bei1
containing_words.word: 少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲

definition: Bernoulli (Swiss mathematical family, including Johann (1667-1748) and Daniel (1700-1782))

sentences.english: Sucess depends on your endeavor and capability.
sentences.chinese: 成功與否取決於你的努力和能力。

sentences.english: China stands ready to earnestly implement the agreement together with Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與越方共同努力，認真落實協議。

sentences.english: But I try to be close to her.
sentences.chinese: 但是我會努力站在她身邊。

sentences.english: Scientists find that hard-working people live longer than average men and women.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們發現努力工作的人比一般的人更有生活。

sentences.english: Everyone has to try to contribute $10 from money that we have earned ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都必須努力從自己掙到的錢裏拿出十美元捐獻。

sentences.english: The president's attempt to correct governmental abuses is successful.
sentences.chinese: 總統爲匡正政府弊端而做的努力頗有成效。

sentences.english: We used a submaximal effort tourniquet test to induce ischemic pain.
sentences.chinese: 我們使用了亞努力止血帶試驗誘發缺血性疼痛。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the government should make efforts to set aside an appropriate fund for the vegetable basket program.
sentences.chinese: 人們建議政府應該做出努力，爲菜籃子工程撥出專款。

sentences.english: Everyone was working hard to construct the new China.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都努力工作建設新中國。

sentences.english: We must work hard to forget that I love to search for you.
sentences.chinese: 要多努力才能忘記讓我愛到深入骨髓的你。

sentences.english: I kno , they Want me to study hard and not to aste time.
sentences.chinese: 我明白他們想讓我努力學習，不要浪費時間。
成功取決於我們的努力。

sentences.english: He ascribes his success in study to hard work.
sentences.chinese: 他把在學習上的成功歸因於自己的努力。

sentences.english: EG:Another effort entails bringing the entire community into the post-ColdWar era.
sentences.chinese: 大家也在努力使整個智囊團進入加速冷戰時期。

sentences.english: Besides, Russia is also working on the localization of strategic missile research, development and manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 此外，戰略導彈研發生產本土化也是俄努力的方向。

sentences.english: He has been pressing to return to China to advocate for greater cultural and religious freedoms for his followers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直努力回到天朝爲他的信徒爭取文化和總角子有。

definition: to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
one step, one footprint (idiom); steady progress/reliable
pinyin: yi1 bu4 yi1 ge4 jiao3 yin4

definition: to do one's utmost/with all one's might/at all costs/(to work or fight) as if one's life depends on it
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
